original_text: Jesus came and he stood near her. He told the illness to go away and immediately she was well again. She got up and she prepared food for her visitors.
korean_text: 예수께서 가까이 서서 열병을 꾸짖으신대 병이 떠나고 여자가 곧 일어나 그들에게 수종드니라

sentences.original_text: He told the illness to go away
and immediately she was well again
and she prepared food for her visitors
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 방문객들을 위해 음식을 준비했다
